If not, see 23 // <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>. 24 30 #ifndef _CXXABI_TWEAKS_H 31 #define _CXXABI_TWEAKS_H 1 32 33 #ifdef __cplusplus 34 namespace __cxxabiv1 35 { 36 extern "C" 37 { 38 #endif 39 40 // The generic ABI uses the first byte of a 64-bit guard variable. 41 #define _GLIBCXX_GUARD_TEST(x) (*(char *) (x) != 0) 42 #define _GLIBCXX_GUARD_SET(x) *(char *) (x) = 1 43 #define _GLIBCXX_GUARD_BIT __guard_test_bit (0, 1) 44 #define _GLIBCXX_GUARD_PENDING_BIT __guard_test_bit (1, 1) 45 #define _GLIBCXX_GUARD_WAITING_BIT __guard_test_bit (2, 1) 46 __extension__ typedef int __guard __attribute__((mode (__DI__))); 47 48 // __cxa_vec_ctor has void return type. 49 typedef void __cxa_vec_ctor_return_type; 50 #define _GLIBCXX_CXA_VEC_CTOR_RETURN(x) return 51 // Constructors and destructors do not return a value. 52 typedef void __cxa_cdtor_return_type; 53 54 #ifdef __cplusplus 55 } 56 } // namespace __cxxabiv1 57 #endif 58 59 #endif
